group_1.textLeft: Heya, Akira-chi!@How do I look?
C'mon, tell me!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, you look great.@It’s really cute.

group_1.textLeft: How old do I seem?

group_1.textRight: (Huh...?[wait:1.0] Her age?@I'm sure I knew it, but...)
...[wait:1.0][chara:300850:lipSynch_1]Um, maybe 17 years old...

group_1.textLeft: You’re outta luck!@The correct answer was 13 years old!
[chara:300651:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Geez Akira-chi, doncha know it's rude@to get a girl's age wrong?

group_1.textRight: You say that, but you seem pretty happy@about it.

group_1.textLeft: You've seen right through me!

group_1.textRight: So you were trying to seem older.

group_1.textLeft: Well yeah!@At least I look the part!
I guess the rest is how you behave.

group_1.textRight: How you behave?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I need to talk like a grown-up to suit@this outfit.
As is, everything's all mismatched, you know?
That's why I'm gonna act like a reliable big sister@from now on.
You'll give me some pointers, right?@I'm counting on you, Akira-chi!

group_1.textRight: This feels like the setup for a comedy sketch,@but sure.
Well for starters, you could work on@projecting serenity?
Instead of saying "Akira-chi,"@you could use "Akira."

group_1.textLeft: Of course I can do that!@You're so smart Akira-chi...

group_1.textRight: Oops.

group_1.textLeft: A... Akir... Akira-cucaracha!

group_1.textRight: CUCARACHA?!@That's even worse!

group_1.textLeft: Uuugh, my mouth is too used to it.@This is harder than I anticipated...

group_1.textRight: Rather than being careful with words,@try being conscious of how you act!

group_1.textLeft: Acting... Acting...@[chara:300651:lipSynch_0]...[wait:1.0][chara:300651:eyeClose_0][chara:300651:motion_200][chara:300651:lipSynch_1]Alright! I've got it this time!

group_1.textRight: Yoohoo! Emily! Akira-chi!@Merry Christmas!

group_1.textLeft: Ah! The Shopping District lady!
...I mean...
Welcome, ma'am. What kind of consultation@are you looking for today?

group_1.textRight: Oh, that was good.
I'm not here for a consultation today.
I just wanted to stop by since it's Christmas.
Here you go! I brought you some orange juice@as a present!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300651:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Wowee!

group_1.textRight: E-Emily!@You’re acting like a toddler!

group_1.textLeft: O-Oh no no no...[wait:1.0][chara:300651:eyeClose_1][chara:300651:motion_000][chara:300651:cheek_0][chara:300651:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300651:lipSynch_1]@Ah-haha. Thank you kindly, ma'am.
Well then, with this juice, let's treat ourselves@this wonderful evening...
Akira, can you get three glasses for us?

group_1.textRight: Sure thing.

group_1.textLeft: On this holy night... Cheers...
Down the hatch!

group_1.textRight: Ah, you went and chugged it.@Things were good up until then.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300651:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]WHAT!?@Adults don't drink it all at once!?

group_1.textRight: A-Akira...@What’s up with Emily today?

group_1.textLeft: She’s trying to match her outfit by behaving@like an adult...

group_1.textRight: Ah, is that so?@She definitely looks more mature than usual.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* How old do I seem?

group_1.textRight: (She's doing it again.)
(Huh...?[wait:1.0] Her age?@I'm sure I knew it, but...)
...[wait:1.0][chara:800600:lipSynch_1]Um, maybe 17 years old...

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:1.0][chara:300651:eyeClose_0][chara:300651:motion_000][chara:300651:lipSynch_1]You're right.

group_1.textRight: You're not right.
I think I see what's going on here.
But if you're aiming for a 17 year old, don’t you@think you’re acting TOO mature?

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: Well, for someone around your age,@I'm sure 17 year olds seem like adults.
But, as someone whose actually been that age,
17 year olds are just kids pretending@to be all grown-up.
They haven't changed much on the inside@from when they were 10.
So I think acting like your usual self@will still leave the right impression.

group_1.textLeft: As expected of a grown-up...@Your skills are next level.
...Yeah, you're right.
Tell us more about being an adult!

group_1.textRight: More?

group_1.textCenter: I want to hear...what adult romance is like...@I'm a little curious...

group_1.textLeft: Didja have a nice Christmas date?

group_1.textRight: I didn't have any plans.@My boyfriend dumped me yesterday...
Since my schedule was free, I came here...

group_1.textLeft: Akira-chi, did I step on a landmine?

group_1.textRight: Maybe…

group_1.textLeft: What would an adult do in this situation?

group_1.textRight: Hmm...

group_1.textLeft: ...Please don't mind what some dumb kids say!

group_1.textRight: Only irresponsible adults would say that!
